name: Solve Ninja
description: About App  The SolveNinja App enables you to solve problems within your neighborhood by helping you find Do-It-Yourself (DIY) solutions to managing waste, water, energy and improving sanitation, and air quality. Reap Benefit already has over 20,000 Solve Ninjas who over the last 6 years have saved 32 million liters of water, built 50 low-cost solutions, and helped 300 schools add water-less urinals etc. Below are the main features of the app.   Success Stories  The user will be able to share their success stories within the app network. Thus allowing other users from the network to motivate and understand and new stories and it impacts.   Suggest DIY Product  You are a Solution Expert and Knows much about DIY (Do-It-Yourself). Go ahead and Suggest a Product to the community of Super Ninja Students and Citizens who are committed to solve problems in their Localities thus Making India Better Place to Live In.   Share an Idea  You are an Idea house. Full of Ideas and Concepts. Share your Idea within community members and get feedback on how it can be implemented or improved. Tag your teammates and invite other people to join, share and motivate through the app. You can even apply for an Early Stage Funding as well! Interesting, Isnt it?   High-Level Feature List   - Sign-up via Facebook / Google or OTP  - Create Profile  - Create Success Story  - Share Products  - Share an Idea  - Comment or Like  - Add Photos / Videos  - Share Stories other Platform
